Recursive subroutine quicksort(a, first, last)
    implicit none
    integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: first, last
    integer :: pivot, i, j, temp
    if (first < last) then
        pivot = a(first) i = first
        j = last
        do
            do while (a(i) < pivot) i = i + 1
            end do
            do while (a(j) > pivot)
                j = j - 1
            end do
            if (i >= j) exit
            temp = a(i)
            a(i) = a(j)
            a(j) = temp i = i + 1
            j = j - 1
        end do
        call quicksort(a, first, j)
        call quicksort(a, j+1, last)
    end if
end subroutine quicksort

Recursive subroutine quicksort(a, first, last)
    implicit none
    integer, intent(inout) :: a(:)
    integer, intent(in) :: first, last
    integer :: pivot, i, j, temp
    if (first < last) then

        i = first
        j = last
        do

            end do
            do while (a(j) > pivot)

            a(j) = temp
            i = i + 1
            j = j - 1

        call quicksort(a, first, j)
        call quicksort(a, j+1, last)
    end if
